p: YF is an acute hemorrhagic hepatonephritis caused by an enveloped single-stranded RNA virus of approximately 12,000 base pairs belonging to the family Flavoviridae. It is transmitted by the bite of a mosquito belonging to the genus Aedes (in Africa and the Americas) or to the genera Haemagogus and Sabethes (in America).
